com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions

Interface DocumentSessionEventHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentSessionProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HostAppDocumentSessionProvider, HostAppDocumentSessionProvider, SingleDocumentSessionProvider

    public interface DocumentSessionEventHandler
    The DocumentSessionEventHandler is used to notify a GuiController about document events. The DocumentSessionProvider implements this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addActiveSessionChangedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener) 
      void addBeforeSessionClosedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener) 
      void addSessionClosedListener(FileNameListener fileNameListener) 
      void addSessionCreatedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener) 

    • Method Detail

      • addBeforeSessionClosedListener

        void addBeforeSessionClosedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener)
        Parameters:
        documentSessionListener - The DocumentSessionListener which have to be notified before a DocumentSession is closed.

      • addActiveSessionChangedListener

        void addActiveSessionChangedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener)
        Parameters:
        documentSessionListener - The DocumentSessionListener which have to be notified after the active DocumentSession has changed.

      • addSessionCreatedListener

        void addSessionCreatedListener(DocumentSessionListener documentSessionListener)
        Parameters:
        documentSessionListener - The DocumentSessionListener which have to be notified after a new DocumentSession is created.

      • addSessionClosedListener

        void addSessionClosedListener(FileNameListener fileNameListener)
        Parameters:
        fileNameListener - The FileNameListener which have to be notified after a DocumentSession has been closed.
